name: laugh_out_loud_jokes
description: What happens to race car drivers when they eat too much? They get indy-gestion. Laugh-Out-Loud Jokes for Kids provides children ages 7-10 many hours of fun and laughter. Young readers will have a blast sharing this collection of hundreds of one-liners, knock knock jokes, tongue twisters, and more with their friends and family This brand new book will have children rolling on the floor with laughter and is sure to be a great gift idea for any child.
